bike.description: Kinesis 6061 sloping radius top tube design, SST tubing diameters, 1 1/8-1.5" tapered head tube, 34.9 seat tube, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Aero straight blade road fork, 1.5 aluminum crown, aluminum blades with chromoly steerer
Alex ID-19 double wall alloy rims with GSW sidewall, 28/32H, Formula alloy hubs with QR and 14g stainless steel spokes
Shimano RD-2300 rear and Shimano FD-3500 front with 34.9mm alloy clamp
Touring platform style, full alloy with toe clips
Jamis alloy micro-adjust, 31.6 x 350mm with alloy clamp
Jamis Road Sport Femme with SL top and satin steel rails
Tektro R317 alloy dual pivot calipers with adjustable pads and Shimano ST-2300 STI brake levers
